item.title: This Week at Remap
item.content:encoded:
https://remapradio.com/articles/this-week-at-remap-68/

PAX East also approaches! If you're there, we'll be drinking beers in the bar of the Westin hotel attached to the convention center on Saturday afternoon from 3 to 5 pm. It's the one right smack dab in the middle of the lobby. If you're there, please say hi! We're not formally renting a venue, just looking for a place to vibe and chat with folks. A bunch of people showed up last year and it was a real highlight!

-pk, who is happy he's getting May Boston weather this time

  • PODCAST: My Turn (80 For Brady) – Nope, we weren't joking. This podcast was Janet's idea, so naturally, we asked Janet to host this, too. It's great. We'll probably take a few weeks off from My Turn before hitting up Big Fan next.
  • STREAM: LudoNarraCon Demos – LudoNarraCon is this week, and once again, we've partnered to host a series of interviews, panels, and streams. We're going to kick that off with a demo stream with me and Cado tomorrow. The interviews/panels will stream as part of LudoNarraCon, then become podcasts on Remap's various feeds, starting next week. Good stuff coming your way!
  • STREAM: Wheel of GeForce Now – The last spin of the wheel, until we inevitably spin the wheel again. What can I get Rob to play this week?
  • PODCAST: Remap Radio – Folks, Janet and I have both gotten very, very into Clair Obscur. Expect a lot of French RPG chat coming your way this week.
  • ARTICLE: Letter Series – As usual, topic TBD.

If you have any support issues, send details on the issue to support@remapradio.com.

Patrick Klepek (he/him) is an editor at Remap. In another life, he worked on horror movie sets, but instead, he also runs Crossplay, a newsletter about parenting and video games. You can follow him on Twitter, Threads, Mastodon, and Bluesky.
